summary:
Selected Npcs can join the marriage faction and be companions. Some can drink Beer and accept gifts. The ugly women have better looks. Riften is a Sinful Place where vices run rampant. And a Tribe of Barbarians who crush your enemies and see them driven before you! 
Requires Additional mods see long description.
descriptionHtml:
REQUIREMENTS for MainFile Don Juan:
Apachis Hairs
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10168
Fores Idle Animations 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11811
uses slots 200 to 230
and AdultShow animations Fnis50-51-70-90 are included in the players club but I recommend you download their mod too.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8714
Pin Up Poser animations will be added in next update so download it here
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=16756
Bingles Buff Armors Stand Alone http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6795
OmegaReds Armor Comp http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10277
HothTroopers WarChief
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13366
=========================================================================================

It adds Chaos, It adds Drama, it adds ??????? 
 

Don Juan,
Contributions by Gambit 77
Umpa,Tr1dae, TheRu, DualSun,Halofarm
HothTrooper, Bingle, OmegaRed,RainofChaos,Fore.
AdultShow team
This is a collection of our work to make a mod that is awesome.

==================================================================================================================================================================================

This mod contains NPCS who are ready to follow and be your Companions, All the women you could not marry before (except for certain NPCs with Major quests that can break your game) will now marry YOU after you give them a drink, a cold coin or some wood.

NPCS have improved Statistics but are not too powerful.
some are essential and some protected and some will die so you need to keep them alive.
Some ugly NPCs look better then they used to so depending on what beauty mods and replacer\'s you have installed they will adapt. 

See List at very bottom of Npcs Affected by this Mod.  If an npc is affected by a different mod that you like because the NPC has different hair but no interesting AI then us TSVNIP load up Don Juan ESP. and delete that NPC from the Don Juan ESP. then save and you should be good. 

when updating I\'d recommend loading your game, removing any items on the npcs and saving then loading that save with the mod off saving again then restarting with updated version of mod on
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Changes: 4.0
The Rift is more interesting
Added Lore to Barbarians. Added unique items thanks to Hothtrooper44http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13366
Added Orc Items thanks to Mandarinn
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5169
Added lore to the items so that it stays within the context of the Elderscrolls.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3.6   
Added the Random person. Nivenor should hit on him or her at the bar on Wednesday at 10am and then take him or her home.
Added Forbidden Romance Novels
 
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Interesting Time Events
See and find out
Explore Riften

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
New Npcs and Barbarian Camp located east of Dark Water Crossing or Explore the game:D.
Ramo- Follow him and learn the ways of Don Juan
Bat-Vigilante
Lana-Nord- Don\'t mess with her
Sheela-Imperial-Valkyrie Warrior
Teela- Dunmer/Human- Half Breed Bounds weapons and is a healer travels to Whiterun and hangs out with Jenassa on Wednesday and Thursday.
Cindell- Female Barbarian Witch
Seht- A tall Argonian who lives at the Bee and Barb
Belmont-A Vampire Slayer.
Rygar- An imperial warrior 
Dar- The BeastMaster
Conan-A powerfully built figure wearing a square cut mane contrasted by smoldering blue eyes.
Rastan- Barbarian Thief
Kuros- A Barbarian Knight
Julia- Barbarian Sista
Imogen- Orc Half breed outcast 

In production of Making a quest to go along but it is not ready yet


=====================================================================================
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Compatible with any mod except for those that alter the npcs l or any made has the same ID assigned by the Creation Kit 
 
=============------------------------------===============================-------------------------------------
Don\'t take it so serious its just fun and games.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

I have low settings on in the pics
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
extract esp or ESM to data folder
to uninstall delete the esp. of choice
delete Don Juan. Esp. or ESM
Meshes Forbidden Romance or Don Juan Depending on what you Donloaded lol

files.changelogHtml:
Added a Whore, a Prostitute, a hooker and a Giggalo who patrol Riften at night
Ai added to whores
Indaryn is a pervert who us addicted to whores added to AI
Players club sneak peak
removed un needed files to packaging
added Bingles armors, Hothtroopers warchief and Omegareds armors to barbarian campsite
Added Lore to Barbarians which explains why they are there
removed Mjoll reluctanly due to her popularity in millions of mods
updated face data.
redid Female orcs due to strange need to outdated files.
redid the looks on a few npcs that stay lore friendly
